Chapter 12 \97How to Handle Doubts and Confusion

Many, especially those who are young in the Christian life, are at times troubled with the suggestions of skepticism. There are in the Bible many things which they cannot explain, or even understand, and Satan employs these to shake their faith in the Scriptures as a revelation from God. They ask, \93How shall I know the right way? If the Bible is indeed the word of God, how can I be freed from these doubts and perplexities?\94
